children.subject: Yes! We do plan on running this decal for Fall 2022.
Hi! Is this Decal being offered in Fall 2022 by any chance? Thank you so much!

history.content:
Interested in Virtual/Augmented Reality? Want to learn Unity? Looking for some extra units?

Apply to the Extended Reality Development DeCal!

Similar to how mobile devices revolutionized the way we interact with our electronic devices, Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality represent another exciting paradigm shift in human computer interaction. XR stands for Extended Reality, which is the realm that encompasses both Virtual and Augmented Reality.

This semester, the course will teach students to develop VR applications in headmounted displays using Unity. Students will get exposure to different kinds of VR/AR apps and work in teams to build their own from scratch. The course is designed for beginners with no prior VR/AR experience required! After completion of the course, we welcome interested students to join an existing project team with XR@Berkeley or pitch their own project.

 

This 3-unit course will be held on Monday’s and Wednesday’s 5:00 - 7:00 PM PST in-person at the Cal Esports Community Center.

 

Apply by January 29th @ 11:59 PM (PST)!

Feel free to browse the course website linked below and contact decal@xr.berkeley.edu with any questions or concerns!

 

Important Links:

DeCal Application: https://forms.gle/WxoK94cUGx2YLqnF9

Official DeCal Listing: https://decal.berkeley.edu/courses/6202

XR DeCal Website: https://xr.berkeley.edu/decal/

Applications for the XR@B Club are open as well! 

Extended Reality at Berkeley is UC Berkeley's organization for virtual reality and augmented reality, offering students the chance to design their own universe. We cultivate creativity and allow members to immerse themselves in worlds that they create with project teams, ranging from simple variations of our existing reality to entirely new, exotic places. Whether you have a background in computer science, 3D modeling, sound design, or UI/UX design, or just general interest in the field, Extended Reality has a place for you! We also have VR esports!

Club application: 

https://forms.gle/PyirHekFg7HBNZDT6
history.subject: Join the Extended Reality Development DeCal! (Spring 2022)
